name: ecommerce-microservices
description: E-commerce order processing system using microservices and event-driven architecture

scripts.build: npm run build:order && npm run build:inventory && npm run build:notification
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run start:dev:order" "npm run start:dev:inventory" "npm run start:dev:notification"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:order && npm run install:inventory && npm run install:notification
